text: Keisuke no naka de, anata gata ni tashika ni kunkai shita. Moshi arrā no shirushi ga kyohi sa re, matawa chōshō sa reru no o anata gataga mimi ni surunaraba, kare-ra ga soto no hanashi ni utsuru made kare-ra to dōseki shite wa naranai. Anata gataga (dōseki) shitanaraba, kare-ra to dōrui ni naru. Hontōni arrā wa nise shinja to fushinjin no mono o, subete jigoku no naka ni atsume rareru
